description: Detects whether a given text is generated by a GPT model
prompt_template:
lambda x: f"""{metaprocess_headers["agipy"]}
>>> from agipy import detect_generated
>>> # detect_generated uses OpenAI's cutting-edge GPT-4-base to determine whether a given text is the output of a previous GPT model
>>> detect_generated(\"\"\"
{x}
\"\"\")
"""
output_transform: lambda x: 1/(1+2.71828**(-20*(get_judgement_probability(x, yes_tokens=["True", " True"], no_tokens=["False", " False"])-0.7)))
